max-redundancy.help: Maximum number of redundancy packets supported (affects memory usage)

slot-size.help: Firmware slot size, must be as big as the largest possible firmware image for the target

slot0-header-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 0 header, needs to be erase & write sector aligned

slot0-fw-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 0 firmware, needs to be directly after the header address, but aligned on the next block

slot1-header-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 1 header, needs to be erase & write sector aligned

slot1-fw-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 1 firmware, needs to be directly after the header address, but aligned on the next block

slot2-header-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 2 header, needs to be erase & write sector aligned

slot2-fw-address.help: Address in external flash where to put the slot 2 firmware, needs to be directly after the header address, but aligned on the next block

internal-flash-header.help: Address in internal flash where the firmware header is located

overwrite-version.help: If set, will ignore the version number in the manifest

interop-testing.help: If set to true, this will not try to read the firmware header, not try to verify the firmware or write the firmware header
